Package org.sat4j.pb.multiobjective

Class AbstractLinMultiObjOptimizer

java.lang.Object
org.sat4j.tools.SolverDecorator<IPBSolver>
org.sat4j.pb.PBSolverDecorator
org.sat4j.pb.PseudoOptDecorator
org.sat4j.pb.multiobjective.AbstractLinMultiObjOptimizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, IPBSolver, IMultiObjOptimizationProblem, org.sat4j.specs.IOptimizationProblem, org.sat4j.specs.IProblem, org.sat4j.specs.ISolver, org.sat4j.specs.RandomAccessModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
MinSumOWAOptimizer, OrderedObjsOWAOptimizer
public abstract class AbstractLinMultiObjOptimizer extends PseudoOptDecorator implements IMultiObjOptimizationProblem
A partial implementation of the IMUltiObjectivePBSolver interface designed to handle optimization functions which are a linear aggregation of other objective functions. The two abstract methods, setInitConstraints() and setGlobalObj(), are called before the solver is called. setInitConstraints() is designed to add linearization constraints, while setGlobalObj() is intended to set the global linear function to the decorated PB solver.
Author:
lonca
See Also:

      public BigInteger[] getObjectiveValues()
